summary: Implemented wallet transaction display fixes (debit/credit signs, currency, balance chip), improved mobile/desktop transaction UX (plural filter label, loading indicator, empty state CTAs, formatted dates, debit/credit chips), and added a reusable sticky VendorPageHeader integrated into the vendor layout for consistent navigation.
current_status: Wallet transaction views updated and vendor dashboard pages now show a sticky header with back/title; no automated tests were run.
